outputs.output_descr: Mechanisms in place to assess natural and human-made risks, including consideration to gender based differences, at national and subnational levels. SP Output 5.1)
Effective institutional, legislative and policy framework to enhance the implementation of inclusive disaster and climate risk management measures at national and sub-levels. (SP Output 5.2)
Policy frameworks and institutional mechanisms enabled at the national and subnational levels for the peaceful management of emerging and recurring conflicts and tensions. (SP Output 5.5)

Preparedness systems in place to effectively address the consequences of and response to natural hazards (e.g., geophysical, climate related) and human-made crisis at all levels of government and community. (SP Output 5.4)

project_descr: Building Resilience and Managing Risks in the ECIS region
